reviews.review: super indico pelos desafios e belo desenvolvimento <3

A classic! Puzzles with portals. Simple and fun. Even the advanced levels aren't very hard but it makes up for it with that butt-clenching feeling when you use portals to launch yourself to a door that will close soon.

I agree, it's a modern classic. First person shooter where you don't shoot enemies (kind of). It's super short, but as you can see from my playtime it can be extended to much more due to different reasons. You can learn to speedrun it. You can let your friends play it and you can see their way of solving puzzles which is fantastic way to learn about different players solving skills if you try to desing your own games. There are advanced version of levels from the main game and there are time challenges. It is packed with all kinds of stuff. As always you can expect brilliant story because of Valve single player games and there's a sarcastic AI narrator which spies on you and has cake for you. Don't wait, get it. It doesn't require strong PC so you can launch it mostly anywhere.
ONe of the best games I've played
really fun game, a great classic with a really entertaining story. Fun challenge to 100% the game too.
Beat the game, short sweet, and the puzzles were satisfying.
Pretty cool concept, and required playing before playing Portal 2 (for both the lore and the innovative gameplay).
This game was pretty much a tech demo and the story can be beaten in one sitting, but is compulsory to play at least once. Besides it's loads of fun.
8/10, hot female protagonist, good atmosphere, good twist, good idea.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND AS A DECADE-LONG FAN. GETTING GOLD ON ALL THE THE CHALLENGE CHAMBERS MADE ME WANT TO WALK BETWEEN TWO PORTALS AND CRUSH MYSELF BETWEEN THEM
thank you valve because of Portal my life now has a purpose

This game is great, loved the story and was quite funny. I have a lot of issues with this game though as its very buggy at times, GLaDOS is a great villain, Curiosity Core is adorable and remember
The Cake is a Lie
i'm a little late to the party but overall way too much fun to mess around with portal gun and solve shit. 10/10 can't wait to play the sequel.
a great puzzle classic with a fun and infamous story
made me think for the first time in years

Its a Awesome game I used to play it like years ago and I love it
